channel.title: Channel's Name
channel.link: Url of html website that corresponds to the channel
channel.managingEditor: Email address of person responsible for editorial content.
channel.webMaster: Email address of person responsible for technical issues relating to the channel.
channel.pubDate: The publication date & time of channel's content.
channel.lastBuildDate: The last time the content changed
channel.generator: The program used to generate the file
channel.ttl: Time in minutes until channel must be refreshed

image.url: URL of a gif, jpg or png image
image.title: Description of the image, normally just title of site
image.link: URL of the originating site of the RSS
image.description: Description of the image in full

channel.rating: The PICS rating for the channel
channel.textInput: A mysterious text input area. Ignore.

item.title: Item's title
item.link:
URL item links to A short synopsis of the item Email address of the item's author A category for the item Another category URL of a comments page for the item
A unique id for the item
Date the item was published RSS feed title
